author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two youth suspected to be in their early 20s were found dead on the railway track between Sulur and Irugur on Wednesday morning.

Alerted

The police suspected that they could be from Kerala and have alerted the police in that State to identify the duo. It is suspected that they could be passengers who fell down from a moving train. Their bodies were sent to Coimbatore Medical College Hospital for post-mortem.
title: Two youth found dead on track
